product_name: Sierra Designs Backcountry Bed 1.5 Season Sleeping Bag - Women's
long_description: Free of zippers, cords and fasteners, this warm-weather bag uses a versatile comforter design that wraps naturally to your preferred sleeping position and easily adjusts to varying temperatures.
short_description: Free of zippers, cords and fasteners, this warm-weather bag uses a versatile comforter design that wraps naturally to your preferred sleeping position and easily adjusts to varying temperatures.
